TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Base64 extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Utilities for encoding and decoding the Base64 representation of binary data.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Encoder flag bit to indicate lines should be terminated with a CRLF pair instead of just an LF.

Docs.summary: Encoder/decoder flag bit to indicate using the "URL and filename safe" variant of Base64 (see RFC 3548 section 4) where - and _ are used in place of + and /.
